summary:
A couple of Flamberges for everyone!
(1-handed and 2 handed)
descriptionHtml:
It hit me a couple of hours ago ( 9:14 am, May 22, 2014, mark this please) that there aren't any Flamberges in Skyrim. I know that there is a Dark Souls Flamberge mod out there, but I wanted something a bit more practical.

I took the mesh of the Iron Claymore, because I love it so much, and I modified it.
I adjusted the blade by adding a few *cough* extra polies and moved them to add a jagged effect.
I adjusted the cross guard, made it look a bit more useful and added some of those guard rings.
I altered the pommel by making it round, to further balance the sword.

I've made 2 different meshes, one for the 2 handed version, and the other for the 1-handed version.
They do a tad more damage than the normal iron weapons and swing ever so slightly faster. (Claymore and Sword)

The swords currently use the Iron Claymore's textures, so any texture packs altering those with alter these. I plan in the future that I will do something and make a unique texture.

Feel free to give feedback, I've used the best of my knowledge of swords when making these, and kept the fantasy aspect there somewhere.

Everyone is welcome to post their own screenies.

Side Note: I know my Claymore of Heroes wasn't my best example of a sword, but here's the link if you want to check that out too: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37571
Also, with some editing of .nif files, you can give the Flamberges the texture of the Claymore of Heroes. I'd like to see what that looks like.

Tools used:
NifSkope
Milkshape3d
Of course, The Creation Kit
